bike.description: Reynolds 853 air-hardened/heat-treated chromoly main tubes, reinforced head tube collars, gusseted down tube, double-butted cromo stays, Jamis lost wax dropouts

components.description: Manitou Tower Pro, MARS Air spring with TPC Absolute Plus damping technology, external rebound & compression-to-lock adjust, 32mm stanchions, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit MX, Alloy cups, ACB bearings
Syncros FL 29" wheelset, Syncros FL hubs featuring Enduro double row angular bearings, 28H, DT Competition spokes, DT Swiss alloy nipples,Tubeless ready
SRAM X9 mid cage rear and X9 28.6mm dual pull front
Syncros AM Flat Top, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 690mm
Syncros AM 1-bolt, 27.2 x 350mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
